Develop an underwater drone that can explore deep-sea environments and collect data on marine life, ocean currents, and geological features.
Create a virtual reality experience that allows users to explore the depths of the ocean without leaving their homes.
Design a new type of underwater vehicle that is more energy-efficient and environmentally friendly than current models.
Develop a new type of underwater camera that can capture stunning images and videos of marine life and underwater landscapes.
Create a mobile app that uses machine learning algorithms to identify different species of marine life based on user-submitted photos and videos.
